Description: Downloads shapefiles for Census block groups.
Downloads shapefiles for ZIP Code Tabulation Areas (ZCTAs).
Downloads road shapefiles for a given county.
Downloads shapefiles for water bodies (e.g., rivers, lakes) for a given county.
Downloads shapefiles for incorporated places (e.g., cities and towns).
Downloads shapefiles for metropolitan and micropolitan statistical areas (Core-Based Statistical Areas).
